article_title: Gate.io Supports Frontier (FRONT) to Self Chain (SLF) Token Migration
event_summary: Gate.io will disable new margin borrowing and crypto loan services for Frontier (FRONT) before August 25, 2024, 08:00 UTC.
user_action_required: No immediate action required if you hold FRONT on Gate.io, but be aware of upcoming service changes.
quantifiable_changes: Total token supply increases from 90 million to 360 million
